name: elm-live
description: Elm development with LiveReload. Feels lightning-fast!

scripts.readme: npm run readme:render && npm run readme:commit
scripts.readme:commit: git reset && git commit --message="Auto-update the readme" Readme.md || echo "npm run readme: Nothing to update."
scripts.test: eslint . && echo "Only linting supported at the moment!"
